data.text: @Vwaters1975 It’s sadly apparent by looking around here what a tits the UK government made of it all. Covid was seeded in Europe in the aki resorts here in 2020 and infection rates were high and vaccination low in this part of Austria…. And still the messaging is clearer and adherence better

@swisslet Same here in Germany (NRW). Covid pass no longer required for entry to shops, but masks still mandatory in all inside public spaces and shops and public transport. Everyone just gets on with it. It really is not a big deal.

@swisslet “I thought restrictions were over, I’d have brought a mask”, said the woman holding a paper towel over her nose and mouth as she walked into the waiting room, this morning. In. The. Hospital.

@JonEarlyDoors They loosened the mask restrictions on 5th March. I wear mine round my neck too and pop it on in enclosed lifts. I have the dog end of a cold, apart from anything else. It’s the simple fact everyone has proper masks. Leadership matters, eh?
